sys_ui_macro.name: clearField
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<script>
		function clearValue(field){
			document.getElementById("x_illu2_illumio_illumio_pce_field_mapping."+field).value = '';
			document.getElementById("sys_display.x_illu2_illumio_illumio_pce_field_mapping."+field).innerText = "Click to select...";
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
